creator: Ajaib Technologies
descriptionHtml:
Invest in the best mutual funds in 30 seconds right from your phone, starting with Rp 10rb

Terdaftar dan diawasi oleh OJK: https://reksadana.ojk.go.id/Public/APERDPublic.aspx?id=TTI69

What is different with Ajaib?
• 100% Safe and Secure: Your money is securely kept by our custodian bank partners and strictly monitored by OJK. You can withdraw your money at any time to your bank account.
• Invest for FREE, Earn Up To 4% Extra Returns: Ajaib lets you invest online with zero transaction fees or hidden charges at withdrawal, unlike banks that charges high fees for the same mutual fund.
• Built for Beginner Investors: Designed for investors without experience, Ajaib automatically recommends the best mutual funds for you so you don't need to analyze hundreds of options yourself.
• 5-minute, Paperless Account Opening: Open your investment account without any paperwork or meeting a salesperson through the Ajaib app.

2 Ways to Invest:

Choose My Own
• Choose from popular investments
• Starting from Rp 10rb
• Zero transaction fees

Automatic Investing
• Made by Ajaib financial experts
• Starting from Rp 400rb
• Zero transaction fees

Start Growing Your Money Today

------------------------------------------------

Have you heard? We've redesigned our Forum into brand-new Komunitas. It's just as good as it was, with additional features:

3. Added ability to edit and delete your posts.
4. Upvote and downvote on comment sections.
5. Fixed bugs and improved performance.

Take a walk around Komunitas and try it out.

Have fun trying out new features,

Invest wisely,

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi Ajaib Investors,

The moment we've all been waiting for is finally here. Now you can easily order Bukalapak's IPO stocks inside Ajaib app! Here's how:
- Update your app
- Open the app and access Bukalapak's order form through the Home page
- Enter your order
- Read the statements, tick the checkbox if you agree, and submit order
- Order success!
Use this opportunity well, Ajaib Investors. Happy investing.

Yours,
Ajaib Team

Hi Ajaib investors,

Now you can exercise your rights directly in Ajaib app. Just access it from the portfolio menu, go to HMETD tab, tap on the rights you have to open its details page, and you can either exercise or sell them as you wish.

Happy investing!

Ajaib

title: Ajaib - Stocks & Mutual Funds

creator: Ajaib Technologies
descriptionHtml:
Ajaib - invest in stocks, crypto assets, and mutual funds
• 100% online registration, invest from Rp1
• Chat with experts and thousands of investors to grow your investments together
• Get up to Rp50 mio worth of stock by referring friends
• Licensed and regulated by OJK and Bappebti

Stocks: trade better, trade smarter

• Ajaib Alert will send you real-time updates on stocks' movement. Be the first to know when you should take your profits or cut your losses.
• Competitive Ranking allows you to understand a company's fundamental strength compared to its competitors in the same industry.
• News Highlight will actively search and summarize any financial news, as well as sending you notifications on relevant corporate actions.
• Get up to 50% cheaper broker fees, 0.10%-0.08% reducing by volume, excludes PPN, Pph, and levy fees.

Aset Kripto: easily diversify your investment

• One app, 3 different products. Open your account only once to gain access to a curated list of best-performing crypto assets, with stocks and mutual funds in one app. Enjoy instant activation for existing users!
• Secure your funds with world-class security and insurance for your coins by Fireblocks and CoinCover. Safe, registered and regulated by Bappebti.
• Well-designed for your seamless transaction, with the same Ajaib-standard UI that you love. Trade better, trade smarter.
• Instant deposit and withdrawals, with Indonesian payment gateway and/or bank support.
• 24/7 customer service support to guide you through your crypto asset journey.

Mutual funds: hundreds of class-leading product for you

• Choose from 150+ funds provided by the top 25 fund managers in Indonesia. Selected carefully based on historical returns and fund managers' performance.
• Rp0 subscription and redemption fees.

For more info, please contact:
Email: support@ajaib.co.id
Facebook: @ajaib.indonesia
Instagram: @ajaib_investasi
Website: https://www.ajaib.co.id
